channel.title: CVE Feed for Popup Maker -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Popup Maker -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-47597|2024-08-03T14:55:08.404Z -- popup%20maker -- popup%20maker%20%E2%80%93%20popup%20for%20opt-ins%2C%20lead%20gen%2C%20%26%20more
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability in Popup Maker Popup Maker – Popup for opt-ins, lead gen, & more.This issue affects Popup Maker – Popup for opt-ins, lead gen, & more: from n/a through 1.17.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-34770|2024-08-02T02:59:22.122Z -- popup%20maker -- popup%20maker%20wp
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Popup Maker Popup Maker WP allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Popup Maker WP: from n/a through 1.2.8.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Popup Maker Popup Maker WP allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Popup Maker WP: from n/a through 1.2.8.
